go_data.justification: CMTM7 has been described in association with the B cell receptor (BCR) complex at the cell surface.
CMTM7 may contribute to BCR signaling as a transmembrane linker of BLNK and the B-cell receptor.
CMTM7 acts as a transmembrane linker of BLNK and the B-cell receptor, suggesting it enables transmembrane signaling receptor activity.
